name: Google Calendar: Striped Weekends, Highlight Today
description: This style combines Google Calendar: MAKE TODAY BG COLOR OBVIOUS (nice job!) and Google Calendar: Striped weekends (stripes! awesome).
additional_info: http://www.huecode.com/ helped me choose a the background for today I preferred. I hope it works for you.
